title: Spacious Modern Living @ Cedar Run
map_address: 888 s. Oneida st near Leetsdale and Oneida
posting_body: ['WELCOME TO YOUR NEW HOME', 'Situated in a lush landscape of old growth trees and charming ponds and featuring open layouts, first-rate amenities and close proximity to Cherry Creek, Cedar Run gives you a stylish place to call home while granting you easy access to everything the city has to offer.', 'Our one and two bedroom apartments feature expansive floor plans with spacious bedrooms, modern decorator kitchens, private patios and balconies and walk-in closets.', "Cedar Run's amenities were designed for an active lifestyle.", 'Inside, you’ll enjoy a state-of-the-art fitness center, heated indoor pool, basketball courts and racquetball courts.', 'Outside, you’ll find two refreshing swimming pools, walking and jogging trails, and a sand volleyball court for fun in the fresh air and sunshine.', 'An incredible Cherry Creek location puts you exactly where you want to be.', 'Luxury apartments near Cherry Creek Mall open a whole host of excellent shopping, dining, and entertainment destinations just around the corner, and with easy access to interstates I-70 and I-225, work, school, and play are always just minutes away from our apartments in Denver, CO.', 'Come experience modern living at its very best at Cedar Run Apartments.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 672 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Oversized Private Balconies/Patios', '- Window Coverings', '- Large Floorplans', '- Custom Countertops', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Park-Like Views', '- Brushed-Nickel Fixtures & Lighting', '- Central Air/Heat', '- Fireplace*', '- Wood plank Flooring', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Elevator', '- Business Center', '- Outdoor Volleyball Sandpit', '- Pets Welcome*', '- Public Transportation', '- Playground & Park-like Setting', '- Underground Garage Parking Available', '- Clubhouse & Three Courtyards with Picnic/BBQ Area', '- Laundry Facilities in Every Building', '- 24hr Emergency Maintenance', '- Minutes from Downtown & Cherry Creek Shopping', '- Conference Room', '- Fitness Center', '- Two Outdoor Heated Swimming Pools & Indoor Heated Swimming Pool', '- Indoor Racquetball Court & Basketball Court', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-4:00PM', 'Cedar Run', '888 South Oneida Street, Denver, CO, 80224', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant,
